page.title: 11Health Care in Felton Area
page.content: Some residents are covered for medical care at the Bromyard surgery and others at several Hereford surgeries. Health visitors and district nurses make visits to patients' homes. The three hospitals in Hereford accept all local accidents and casualties. The Bromyard hospital deals with geriatric cases. A private hospital is also available in Hereford. Dentists are found in Bromyard and Hereford, but they also visit Burley Gate Primary School, as do health visitors and doctors. Once a month a mobile Infant Welfare Clinic visits the area. A nurse and a doctor are in attendance to give advice and medical treatment.
